_comments.chunkSize: Number of URLs per scenario batch file (default: 40). Lower values = more batches but easier on memory. Higher values = fewer batches but faster processing.
_comments.removeSelectors: Array of CSS selectors to remove before taking screenshots (e.g., cookie banners, chat widgets)
_comments.hideSelectors: Array of CSS selectors to temporarily hide (e.g., dynamic content like timestamps)
_comments.delay: Wait time in milliseconds before taking screenshot (increase for slow-loading pages)
_comments.misMatchThreshold: Acceptable difference percentage between reference and test (0-100). Lower = stricter, higher = more forgiving
_comments.requireSameDimensions: Require reference and test images to have same dimensions
_comments.viewports: Screen sizes to test. Add/remove as needed for your project
_comments.asyncCaptureLimit: Number of screenshots taken in parallel (lower = more stable, higher = faster)
_comments.asyncCompareLimit: Number of comparisons done in parallel
_comments.debugWindow: Show browser window during testing (useful for debugging)
